Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CONCLUSION : In this preliminary study patients submitted to PTRA showed a lower susceptibility to renal damage induced by CM administration than PCI patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Renal damage |
| CM-induced renal damage |

In this preliminary study, patients undergoing Percutaneous Transluminal Angioplasty (PTRA) showed a lower susceptibility to renal damage induced by Contrast Media (CM) administration than patients undergoing Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI).
